column2: Remove volumes exhibiting excessive motion. You must specify a threshold with the ‘scrubbingThreshold’ key.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

column2: The maximum acceptable Framewise Displacement (FD) in millimeters.
Number of volumes to remove preceeding a volume with excessive FD.
Number of volumes to remove subsequent to a volume with excessive FD.
